discourse_list.title: Un-Fuzzing the Endgame Plan at EthGathering Barcelona\xe2\x80\x94on Drinks with MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: The MakerDAO Community Gathers in Barcelona to Break-Down the Endgame Plan   If you are in need of learning the basic mechanics of the Pregame of MakerDAO’s pivot to the Endgame Plan, this workshop at EthGathering 2022 is Must See TV! Learn what roles the DVCs, councils, and tribunals perform when creating the frameworks of the upcoming primary, secondary, and tertiary Scopes. You’re lost on what exactly is a Scope? No worries—the Maker community members got your back—just watch, listen, review, and learn. Don’t get left-behind and Learn as much as possible about MakerDAO’s Endgame Plan now! Not Financial Advice!! This Content is for entertainment, educational, and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the “Drinks With MakerDAO Delegate” YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by MakerDAO’s community members, MakerDAO’s Core Unit Team Members, @ultraschuppi  a.k.a, Tim Schuppner,  @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.
